description.en: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ar: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.br: Aumenta a taxa de sucesso em fortalecimentos em x1.1 até +7. Para usar, coloque o pergaminho na caixa apropriada no Menu de Fortalecimento antes de começar a fortalecer. O pergaminho é consumido no processo.
description.cns: 为精炼+7前的阶段提供+10%的成功率。若要使用，请在尝试精炼之前，在精炼菜单的相应框中放置卷轴。卷轴在此过程中被消耗掉。
description.de: Upgrade-Erfolgsrate x1,1 bis zu +7. Zur Verwendung muss die Schriftrolle in das entsprechende Feld im Upgrade-Menü gesetzt werden, bevor das Upgrade durchgeführt wird. Die Schriftrolle wird während des Vorgangs verbraucht.
description.fi: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fil: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.fr: Placez ce parchemin dans la case correspondante du menu d'amélioration pour augmenter le taux de réussite de 10%, efficace jusqu'à +7. Le parchemin sera consommé.
description.id: Tingkatkan tingkat keberhasilan x1.1 hingga +7. Untuk menggunakannya, tempatkan gulir di kotak yang sesuai di Menu Upgrade sebelum mencoba melakukan upgrade. Gulir dikonsumsi dalam proses.
description.it: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.jp: 最大+7まで精錬成功率1.1倍。 使用するには、精錬メニューの該当する位置にスクロールを置き、使用できます。精錬中に消費されます。 （通称: SFusion）
description.kr: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.nl: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.pl: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.ru: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.sp: +10% de tasa de éxito de Mejora. Para usarlo, coloca el Pergamino en la casilla correspondiente del Menú de Mejora antes de intentar la mejora. El pergamino se consume en el proceso.
description.sw: Upgrade success rate x1.1 up to +7. To use, place scroll in the appropriate box on the Upgrade Menu before attempting the upgrade. The scroll is consumed in the process.
description.th: อัตราความสำเร็จในการอัพเกรด x1.1 ไปจนถึง +7 ในการใช้งาน ให้วางคัมภีร์ไปที่กล่องที่เหมาะสมบนเมนูอัพเกรดก่อนที่จะพยายามอัพเกรด  คัมภีร์นี้จะหมดไปเมื่อใช้แล้ว
description.tw: 升級成功率 x1.1 高達 +7。 要使用，請在嘗試升級之前將卷軸放在升級選單上的相應框中。卷軸在這個過程中被消耗掉。
description.vi: Nâng cấp tỉ lệ thành công x1.1 lên +7. Để sử dụng, hãy đặt scroll vào ô thích hợp trên Upgrade Menu trước khi thử nâng cấp. Scroll được sử dụng trong quá trình này.
